item.description: The topics we thought interesting could be internet dating; do's and don'ts, or whatever we decide upon at the forum, so give it some thought and bring your ideas.
item.how_to_find_us: Directions to Nancy's home in Stoughton will be given to you after you RSVP and by emailing Nancy directly. We will probably order pizza and salad, but would like everyone to bring a beverage to share.
item.why: This could be just what you need to help you get out of that rut, or inspire you to go for it, or make that change! We could all learn something about ourselves (and the food is always great).
item.name: Forum - Love/Relationships/Happiness
